name: Grilled Steak and Fresh Mozzarella Flatbread
author: Beef. It's What's for Dinner.
summary: Steak meet salad. Salad meet pizza. A tasty introduction has been made.
ingredients: 1 pound beef top sirloin center filets, cut 1 inch thick, tied
¼ pound fresh mozzarella cheese, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
4 each naan breads (Indian flatbread) or pita breads
directions: Press lemon pepper evenly onto steaks
Place steaks on grid over medium, ash-covered coals
Grill, covered, 12 to 17 minutes (over medium heat on preheated gas grill, 12 to 16 minutes) for medium rare (145 degrees F) to medium (160 degrees F) doneness, turning occasionally
Meanwhile, combine spinach, cheese and basil in large bowl
Drizzle with balsamic vinegar; toss to coat and set aside
Remove steak from grill and let stand 5 minutes
Place naan on grill; grill, covered, 1 to 3 minutes or until lightly browned, turning once
Top naan evenly with spinach mixture and steak slices
